name: The Killer (itch)
description:
Made for TriJam #45.

One smart-phone gains sentience and tries to destroy all humanity.However the humans fight back with guns and text messages.

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Space to close text messages.

Avoid lava and bullets. Go into people to kill. Try to get a high score.

Unfortunately it only works on windows, as far as I know.
